snippet.title: Yandere Simulator Live-Action Trailer
snippet.description:
About two years ago, I envisioned a trailer for a horror film based on Yandere Simulator. I really enjoyed the idea that I came up with, and it stayed in my mind for a long time. Last year, I discovered a group of cosplayers who did an outstanding job of dressing up as Yandere Sim characters. I asked them if they would be willing to help me create the trailer that I had envisioned – and to my delight, they agreed!

My role in this video was relatively small; I simply described what kind of footage I wanted, and edited the video together. Everything else that you see here only exists thanks to these amazing people:

Voiceover by Michaela Laws (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQTyMsas9G2_NAQkZFI-2UQ)

Yandere-chan by woofkid (https://www.instagram.com/woooofkid/, https://www.youtube.com/user/TheScarletRipper)

Senpai / Osana Najimi by Akira (https://www.instagram.com/conradlouren/)

Kokona Haruka by vatunya (https://www.instagram.com/_vatunya_/)

Midori Gurin by Ohikko (https://www.instagram.com/ohik.k.k.o/)

Amai Odayaka by Jeremy (https://www.instagram.com/the_greatest_doormat/)

Oka Ruto / Kizana Sinobu / Hanako Yamada by Misa Ki (https://www.instagram.com/misakinakamura23/, https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBfujcU2Vi-Xfx0lckBLWEA)

Muja Kina by Ayane~chan (https://www.instagram.com/rina_1kova/)

Filmed by nook1a (https://www.instagram.com/nook1a/) and Edward Frozen (https://www.instagram.com/edwardfrozen/, https://www.youtube.com/user/SonicTheHedgehog612)

Info-chan by Nika Coffee (https://www.instagram.com/saika.fotur/)

Piano music by Taylor Ambrosio Wood

Ending music by Irish Trish
